forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 9C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 48F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain this evening. Showers continuing overnight. Low around 5C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 42F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 47F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the evening then periods of showers after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early with showers developing late. Low 41F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy in the morning then periods of showers later in the day. High 9C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High 48F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. Low 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. High 43F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low near 35F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 70%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High 4C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid to upper 30s. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain and snow. Low 33F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High around 5C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds overnight. Low -1C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear early, then a few clouds later on. Low near 30F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun early, then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 4C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low near -0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. High 4C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies. High 39F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime after midnight. Low -1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with a mixture of light rain and snow developing late. Low 28F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming more intermittent in the afternoon. High 1C. Winds ESE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning. A shower or two in the afternoon - otherwise, mostly cloudy. High around 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 26F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and freezing rain early...then cloudy with a few rain showers possible in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and freezing rain early...with rain showers in the afternoon. High near 35F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low -4C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 26F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.
